rows.label: campfev11_730_100_msg0001
rows.name:
Our destination is the Core of Iira,
where Metsu waits.

rows.label: campfev11_730_100_msg0003
rows.name:
If we pass through the Holy Gate of
Altana, which lies beyond the Desert,
the path to the core should open.

rows.label: campfev11_730_100_msg0004
rows.name:
It's a very important place to
the Iiran Kingdom,
so it has numerous seals...

rows.label: campfev11_730_100_msg0005
rows.name:
Metsu probably undid them all
with the Iiran Seal he took.

rows.label: campfev11_730_100_msg0008
rows.name:
The Iiran Divine Beast's true
form has been revealed.

rows.label: campfev11_730_100_msg0009
rows.name: We don't have much time left.
